name: phonebook
description: Backend for MOOC course FullStack Open Phonebook

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd /Users/markus/Documents/FullStackOpen/FullStackPart3/phonebook/frontend/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build /Users/markus/Documents/FullStackOpen/FullStackPart3/phonebook/backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
